data.Title: Google Search Ranking Volatility
data.Description: Data from Advanced Web Ranking shows that Google search rankings have been extremely volatile in the past two days.

data.Title: Google Ads Reporting Outage
data.Description: Google Ads is experiencing an outage affecting ad reporting and some interfaces.

data.Title: Reddit Blocks Bing Over AI Data Scraping
data.Description: Reddit is demanding payment from Microsoft and other companies if they want to use Reddit data to train their AI models.

data.Title: News Sites Block OpenAI's SearchGPT Bot
data.Description: Several top news websites, including The New York Times, Wired, and The New Yorker, have blocked OpenAI's new web crawling bot, SearchGPT.

data.Title: Google Updates Algorithms to Demote Deepfakes
data.Description: Google has updated its search algorithms and controls to combat deepfakes, aiming to prevent such content from ranking highly in search results.

data.Title: Google Tests New Sitelinks "Pill" Format
data.Description: Google is testing a new "pill" format for sitelinks on desktop search results.

data.Title: Outbrain Acquires Teads for $1 Billion
data.Description: Outbrain has confirmed its acquisition of Teads in a deal valued at over $1 billion.
